reviewText: It's a very good show for young girls, good at holding their attention. And educational as well. But this video is a bit short compared to the dvd you purchased of Chloe's Closet
This is a good DVD, but it's not a favorite of my two granddaughters. We're going to get another Chloe anyway!
I think it is a good show for little girls to watch.  She watches with her twin brother Khobee at mawmaws house.
My five year old twins still love this sweet and enjoyable DVD! No scary parts, very entertaining! I would recommend it
